page.title: 15MOVEMENT OF FAMILIES
page.content:
We asked the children in our school whose families had moved into the area to tell us why they came here. We found that most people moved because they had changed their employment or because they wanted a different house. Here are our results: REASONS WHY PEOPLE MOVED INTO OUR AREA Change of employment... ... ... 12 Moved to a larger house ... ... 8 Moved to a better house ... ... 4 Moved to a less expensive house.. 2 Wanted to live in the countryside 1
Because these families have children at school these statistics refer only to younger people and take no account of older people who might have moved for other reasons (e.g. retirement). Four families left the area recently because of changes in employment.
